channel.title: (Rendering Distance) 600+
channel.description: Dear Moparians, I am not sure if this is supposed to be in Client Section or Server Section... However, I am looking to change the rendering distance, like the visibility I guess :/ I'm not sure how it really works, I guess i'm looking to change the horizontal and vertical rendering. Like some Servers have a "Zoom button for Zooming in or out" How would I be able to add something like that to my server for instance? Here's a pic of my client.

item.title: (Rendering Distance) 600+
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Huh. I thought he released the code somewhere…

Your problem is going to be that most 600+ clients aren’t really refactored… So unless your camera-related variables have already been renamed by someone… Well, you have to find them.

Read full topic

item.title: (Rendering Distance) 600+
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:553838”]It’s going to be client sided.
Take a look at ambokile’s thread on multi-plane rendering… It’s for his 317 client but it may help.[/quote]
Will definitely take a look.
Thanks.

EDIT: I have looked around the link, looks pretty good… Except one thing… The guy says in his post he might release his code in the future…? I didn’t really see much info available in the posts.

Read full topic

item.title: (Rendering Distance) 600+

item.title: (Rendering Distance) 600+
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

Dear Moparians,
I am not sure if this is supposed to be in Client Section or Server Section… However, I am looking to change the rendering distance, like the visibility I guess
I’m not sure how it really works, I guess i’m looking to change the horizontal and vertical rendering.
Like some Servers have a "Zoom button for Zooming in or out"
How would I be able to add something like that to my server for instance?
Here’s a pic of my client.

Read full topic
